headline: Adtelligent Scoops “Best Overall OTT Solution Provider" at 2025 MarTech Breakthrough Awards
summary: NEW YORK, Aug. 14, 2025 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- Adtelligent Inc., a global advertising technology company, has been recognized as the “Best Overall OTT Solution Provider” in the prestigious MarTech Breakthrough Awards 2025. This award highlights Adtelligent’s innovation and leadership in delivering robust, scalable, and privacy-first OTT advertising solutions that help publishers and media owners maximize their revenue and audience engagement. headline: Price guarantees and plan updates dominate wireless promotions in Q2
summary: In Q2, carriers implemented updates to service plans and introduced price guarantees aimed at mitigating consumer concerns around rising costs.

raw.headline: Price guarantees and plan updates dominate wireless promotions in Q2

headline: CTIA Announces Verizon's Kyle Malady as Chairman
summary: CTIA, the wireless industry association, today announced that Kyle Malady, Executive Vice President and Chief Executive Officer of Verizon Business, has been appointed as CTIA's Chairman, effective immediately.

raw.headline: CTIA Announces Verizon's Kyle Malady as Chairman
raw.summary: CTIA, the wireless industry association, today announced that Kyle Malady, Executive Vice President and Chief Executive Officer of Verizon Business, has been appointed as CTIA's Chairman, effective immediately.

headline: Anoki Named "Best Overall CTV Solution Provider" in 2025 MarTech Breakthrough Awards
summary: MOUNTAIN VIEW, Calif., August 14, 2025--Anoki, the pioneer in multimodal AI for Connected TV (CTV), today announced it has been named "Best Overall CTV Solution Provider" in the 8th annual MarTech Breakthrough Awards, conducted by MarTech Breakthrough, a leading market intelligence organization that recognizes the world’s most innovative marketing, sales, and advertising technology companies.

raw.headline: Anoki Named "Best Overall CTV Solution Provider" in 2025 MarTech Breakthrough Awards
